TextBlock.Text: ERROR: Fragmentary Data Found, Attempting Retrieval...
Best guess at reconstruction complete, displaying arc data now.
ALERT: These arcs have been reconstructed from mixed format data.
AMETHYST: Ready to begin, is everything in order?
OPAL: Everything is ready on my end.
TOPAZ: Agreed, Diamond is only getting minor fluxuations, but nothing outside of our calculations.
AMETHYST: Copy, engaging the device at the core.
TOPAZ: Diamond passed out from stress, poor thing, but everything's st-
AMETHYST: Topaz? I heard an abrupt cut from your mic are you alr-
OPAL: Hello? Did I lose connec-
